name: Path
description: This piece’s purpose is to display my devotion to the great work. I feel the most comfortable with the title “Chaos Magician”, however I just chose to call myself a solitary practitioner because I love learning about many other paths. Also, because once I’m told (or realize /awaken to who I really am) I really truly know what title, if any, to refer myself to. I chose to display the Kabbalah’s Tree of Life, recreating my favorite page from a special magical book. I’ve been studying this spiritual path, However no matter where I stray off to, I always seem to come back to this path. The gal on the other side, who is - covered in large draping pentagrams (fyi: which is a symbol for the 5 elements and not satanist symbol) and a hood with the red triangle, referring to the fire symbol.. is meant to be a representation of me and my attractions. As a creative, fire represents passion, creation and ambition. Merging my spiritual practice with my art has helped me have so much appreciation for it. Such as: appreciating others success, knowing that we all have our true will so it’s pointless to be competitive towards each other and also receiving ideas in my meditations- which helps me not be so possessive over them. Sorry for all the words.. I could go on… lol but this is… my path :)
